Once you’ve printed your label at your chosen Evri ParcelShop drop off

store will provide you with a receipt for your parcel.
  Notify recipient of impending charges

Customs, duties, and taxes will be applied to all parcels travelling
outside of Great Britain. You have selected to send parcel(s) in this order
as ‘Delivered Duties Unpaid (DDU)’. This means any customs duty owed must
be paid by the recipient. Customs officials will contact the recipient for
payment, and this will need to be paid before the parcel is released. View
our guidance on customs duty here
<https://link.international.evri.com/click/696ab07a9ab22cbc870fb314/aHR0cHM6Ly9pbnRlcm5hdGlvbmFsLmV2cmkuY29tL2V1LXNoaXBwaW5nP3V0bV9zb3VyY2U9VHJhbnNhY3Rpb25hbCZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWVtYWlsJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1UcmFuc2FjdGlvbmFsUHJvY2VzcyZ1dG1fY29udGVudD1PcmRlckNvbmZpcm1hdGlvbg/696ab04219ba39d5ef04f64cBbf5cefe0>

conversations.body_text: Hi Connor Mitchell, Alright, thank you for your prompt reply. We will process your refund after inspecting the returned item.
